医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
TherageniX 和诺丁汉大学获得 99.5 万英镑的创新英国拨款，用于开发用于骨再生的粉末基因疗法来自英国创新药物制造转型计划的资金支持细胞内药物输送的创新技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/TherageniX-and-University-of-Nottingham-awarded-c2a3995K-Innovate-UK-grant-to-develop-powdered-gene-therapy-for-bone-再生.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d08c8a6f-75a2-4bca-994e-7731d9e0efd1 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:54:00 -0400 TherageniX and University of Nottingham awarded £995K Innovate UK grant to develop powdered gene therapy for bone regeneration
调整节奏，对抗阿尔茨海默病：间歇性禁食在对抗阿尔茨海默病神经退行性变中的作用News Medical 采访了加州大学圣地亚哥分校神经科学副教授 Paula Desplats 博士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Aligning-Rhythms-Defying-Alzheimers-Intermittent-Fastings-Role-in-Combating-Alzheimers-Disease-Neurode Generation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Aligning-Rhythms-Defying-Alzheimers-Intermittent-Fastings-Role-in-Combating-Alzheimers-Disease-Neurode Generation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a13c2e90-cb80-46ff-82c7-2c1ee3bb5041 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:44:00 -0400 Aligning Rhythms, Defying Alzheimer's: Intermittent Fasting's Role in Combating Alzheimer's Disease Neurodegeneration
食用色彩缤纷的水果和蔬菜可以改善妊娠糖尿病的管理吗？一篇新论文探讨了食用彩色水果和蔬菜（CFV）的饮食影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Can-the-conspiration-of-colorful-fruits-and-vegetables-improve-the-management-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Can-the-conspiration-of-colorful-fruits-and-vegetables-improve-the-management-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5945bbb9-71fd-4967-bec9-a032e32c69ef Fri, 01 Sep 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Can the consumption of colorful fruits and vegetables improve the management of gestational diabetes?
低剂量阿司匹林可使老年人患 2 型糖尿病的风险降低 15%将于今年在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（10 月 2 日至 6 日）上公布的新研究表明，65 岁和 65 岁的老年人使用低剂量（每天 100 毫克）阿司匹林年龄越大，患 2 型糖尿病的风险降低 15%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Low-dose-aspirin-linked-to-1525-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Low-dose-aspirin-linked-to-1525-lower-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d441ab-d3b2-4ddf-8f0b-542c3c12256f Thu, 31 Aug 2023 23:16:08 -0400 Low-dose aspirin linked to 15% lower risk of type 2 diabetes in older adults
研究表明重做 TAVR 手术安全有效Cedars-Sinai 的研究人员是带球囊扩张瓣膜的经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 创新和使用的领导者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Redo-TAVR-procedures-are-safe-and- effective-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Redo-TAVR-procedures-are-safe-and- effective-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57dd244d-259b-4dd1-ba8a-8befa6205536 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 23:11:34 -0400 Redo TAVR procedures are safe and effective, study shows
研究表明肥胖患者减肥手术前后的抑郁症和炎症之间存在密切联系美国国家健康与护理研究所 (NIHR) 资助的研究表明，接受减肥手术的肥胖患者血液中炎症水平较高，预示着手术后六个月减肥效果较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-shows-strong-link- Between-depression-and-inflammation-in-obese-病人-before-and-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-shows-strong-link- Between-depression-and-inflammation-in-obese-病人-before-and-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7626cd1-c43a-4f58-9604-991d6df75558 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 23:06:58 -0400 Study shows strong link between depression and inflammation in obese patients before and after bariatric surgery
新基因疗法为β地中海贫血患者带来希望自 FDA 批准以来，奥克兰加州大学旧金山分校贝尼奥夫儿童医院为第一位患者提供了新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-beta-thalassemia-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-beta-thalassemia-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b4c5d24-d345-4694-9f17-1446d195a811 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 22:49:39 -0400 New gene therapy offers hope for beta thalassemia patients
这一发现可能会带来更有效的癌症治疗方法凯斯西储大学的生化研究人员发现了一种导致癌症的关键蛋白质的新功能，他们相信这一发现可能会为一系列癌症和其他疾病提供更有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Discovery-could-lead-to-more- effective-treatments-for-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Discovery-could-lead-to-more- effective-treatments-for-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee933944-213d-434b-8ad9-c850dfc641f0 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 22:48:49 -0400 Discovery could lead to more effective treatments for cancers
IBS 研究人员发现脂肪代谢调节的新见解这是一项重大进展，为全球 10 亿肥胖者带来了希望。由基础科学研究所 (IBS) 认知与社会中心 (CCS) 主任 C. Justin LEE 领导的研究人员发现了关于脂肪代谢调节的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/IBS-researchers-discover-new-insights-into-the-regulation-of-fat-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/IBS-researchers-discover-new-insights-into-the-regulation-of-fat-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62575e25-6201-4329-a1fa-a0e2610eaee7 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 22:44:31 -0400 IBS researchers discover new insights into the regulation of fat metabolism
特定离子通道的独特开口可能导致选择性药物的开发离子通道由于其在健康和疾病中的重要性而成为有吸引力的药物靶标，但寻找选择性靶向特定离子通道的方法是一个重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Unique-openings-in-specific-ion-channels-could-lead-to-development-of-selective-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Unique-openings-in-specific-ion-channels-could-lead-to-development-of-selective-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3aa69dce-b32c-4302-beac-e4914da79181 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 22:39:44 -0400 Unique openings in specific ion channels could lead to development of selective drugs
